traits.name: Death Throes
entries: When the draconian is reduced to 0 hit points, it bursts into flames and is reduced to ashes. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the draconian must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The draconian makes two Serrated Sword attacks and one Tail attack.

actions.name: Serrated Sword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
